reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, well-made, and comfortable, with one noting it's not tight or binding anywhere. The Swiss dot fabric adds a delicate touch, and they appreciate its flattering design, with one mentioning how it highlights the waist. The color receives positive feedback, and customers like the fit, noting it hits right below the ankle. Regarding size, while some say it's true to size, others report it runs very large. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars â€œFlattering, Comfortable, and Gorgeous!â€
items.body: I absolutely love this PRETTYGARDEN dress! The smocked top is super flattering, and the Swiss dot fabric gives it the perfect feminine touch. Itâ€™s comfortable, fits true to size, and works for both casual days and dressier events. Definitely one of my new favorites! Read more
items.author: Lisa Moore

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful as a Boysenberry!
items.body: Beautiful dotted-swiss fabric in a rich berry color with the raised â€œdotsâ€ providing a barely-there lighter shade of color and texture that bring it to life! I ordered according to my bust measurement and it fit perfectly except for the length. Iâ€™m 5â€™3â€ and hemmed the skirt six inches which brought the hem to just above my toes, clearing my footsteps. Though lightweight flowy fabric, there is a lot of yardage, providing sufficient weight to enhance the design on your body! I had constant compliments all day wearing this dress! Really a lovely dress. One caveat is that the polyester fabric wrinkles more than is convenient, but presses well. Still 5 stars! â­ï¸ ðŸŒ¹ Read more
items.author: Cheryl D. Anderson-Sanchez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flattering, Comfortable, and Perfect for Fall!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The smocked top fits beautifully, giving a flattering shape, while the tiered skirt flows nicely and feels light and feminine. The Swiss dot fabric adds a lovely texture, and the square neckline is elegant without being too revealing. It was perfect for my trip to Paris. Iâ€™ve already gotten so many compliments every time I wear it! Read more
items.author: The Joy Edit

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty, just don't love the Swiss dot material
items.body: Fits great & TTS (wearing XS, I'm 5'3" 125lbs) - seems to be of nice quality - nice and flowy, great Fall color, very pretty overall! I only wish it came in a solid pattern, as the Swiss dot material looks almost polka-dot in pictures. Read more
items.author: ASHâœ¨

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous, flowy, and so comfortable!
items.body: This PRETTYGARDEN Smocked Maxi Dress is absolutely stunning! Itâ€™s the perfect combination of elegance and comfort, making it great for both casual outings and dressier occasions. The square neckline and smocked bodice are super flattering, and the Swiss dot fabric adds a delicate, feminine touch. What I Love: âœ… Flattering Fit â€“ The smocked top hugs just right, while the flowy skirt is super forgiving and comfortable. âœ… Beautiful Fabric â€“ The Swiss dot texture gives it an elegant, high-quality look. âœ… Perfect for Any Occasion â€“ Can be dressed up with heels or kept casual with sandals. âœ… Pockets! â€“ Always a plus in any dress. âœ… True to Size â€“ Fits well and has a nice amount of stretch. Overall, this dress is a must-have for spring and beyond! Itâ€™s lightweight, stylish, and so easy to wear. Iâ€™ve gotten tons of compliments and will definitely be buying more colors! Read more
items.author: Allie C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True to size and good material
items.body: I am 5â€™2, around 110 lbs and also 19 weeks pregnant with a little baby bump. I ordered an XS and it fits perfect! The length is right at my angles and it is not see through. The dress is stretchy enough that it fits my baby bump and will even allow for me to grow and be comfortable in it later on. Awesome dress! I will be buying it in another color. Read more
items.author: Anna Roberts

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice pattern and color, but dislike the weird bumpy fabric.
items.body: I should've made the pictures bigger to inspect the fabric-- I didn't realize it had those bumps from looking at the pictures not zoomed in. It's a nice pattern with a good fit, and I do like the green color, and the generous amount of material used. But I much prefer smooth fabric, I'm not sure why there are so many dresses on Amazon with annoying bumpy fabric. Read more
items.author: Auroraborealis

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best dress!
items.body: Love this dress! Iâ€™ve received so many compliments on it and absolutely adore the fit. The quality is amazing for the price, and even after a year, it still looks great. Itâ€™s lightweight enough to wear in the late summer and it doesnâ€™t wrinkle easily. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Mikia jankoviak

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Dark Army Green, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Brick Red, Dark Green, Light Blue, Red, Rose Red, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
